EmailTemplate.name: TSE-2017-10-10-Charlotte Community Appreciation.ES-2017-10-03-Invite.ES-2017-09-
EmailTemplate.subject: Join me at TopGolf?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/charlotte-community-appreciation-topgolf/]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
On Tuesday, October 10th, the Turbonomic and Dynamix teams will be hosting your technology peers for an evening of food, drinks, and of course, golf, at TopGolf in Charlotte. We'll casually learn about the Turbonomic product roadmap from Turbonomic customers and network, while we work on our golf swing. Whether you are customer today or still considering becoming a part of the family, I hope you will join my team for this fun event to get to know our community.
TopGolf Charlotte <[[https://turbonomic.com/charlotte-community-appreciation-topgolf/]]>
8024 Savoy Corporate Drive, Charlotte, NC 28273 Tuesday, October 10th 5:30pm <[[https://turbonomic.com/charlotte-community-appreciation-topgolf/]]>
I hope to see you there,
Emilio Siman Regional Sales Director, Turbonomic
